trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Cedar City
There were no other sightings in Cedar City on or around April 19th 2005
Summary: Traveling down hwy.14 from Duck creek when we lost time after seeing a triangle shaped object in the sky. we also lost 15mins. on the hwy 15 after leaving Cedar City going back to St. George.
divs: Sighting Detailswe have a summer home in the mountains of Dixie National forest and on one of our trips back to the city we saw a triangular shaped object in the sky. It had red and green lights an seemed to have eerie steem lines coming down from the craft. When it left we noticed we had lost about 15 mins. that we could not account for. after that I had a headache for a few days.
